result.execSummary:
The defendant Bailey J. Potter-Burke was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case. One or more other charges in this case were dismissed. The dismissed charges were not proven and have no legal effect. Bailey J. Potter-Burke is presumed innocent of the dismissed charges.

  • Bailey J. Potter-Burke was found guilty of Possession of THC, an unclassified misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 961.41(3g)(e).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

judgments.action: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

charges.dispoDesc: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Bailey J. Potter-Burke

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt: 3:12 p.m. Defendant Bailey J. Potter-Burke in court.  Michael William Schiek appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Schiek recites agreement. Defendant wishes to proceed without counsel. Waiver free and voluntary. State moves to dismiss Count 2 - Granted. Defendant enters no contest plea.   Court reads on waiver of rights and tendering plea. Waiver free and voluntary. Court finds that a factual basis for the plea exists and finds defendant guilty. Schiek/Court statement on sentencing. Court imposes fine of $328.50 payable within 60 days. Adj. 3:25 p.m.  Review hearing scheduled for August 1, 2016 at 03:00 pm.

3:37 p.m. Defendant Bailey J. Potter-Burke in court.  Michael William Schiek appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Defendant wishes to proceed on own - Schiek statement to potential resolution. Bail continued. Adj. 3:38 p.m.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for May 31, 2016 at 03:00 pm.

ADDRESS INFO for Bailey J. Potter-Burke
Current: 1491 Marsha Lane, Arbor Vitae, WI 54568 United States  (Effective: 03-14-2016)
Prior: 11347 Butterfield Loop, Arbor Vitae, WI 54568

1:36 p.m. Defendant Bailey J. Potter-Burke in court, via video, in custody.  Michael William Schiek appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  In receipt of complaint, right to counsel - defendant will seek counsel, Schiek statement to bail - Schiek statement to special disposition under 973.015 in case adjudicated in February, 2016. Court sets $ sig bond. Adj. 1:41 p.m.  Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for April 11, 2016 at 02:30 pm.
